name: Meet Up
about: Built an online meeting app in React.js & Next.js with streaming SDK integration, supporting video/audio calls, screen sharing, and real-time chat for seamless virtual collaboration.

name: Trade Wizard
about: Developed a React.js stock analysis platform with APIs for market news, daily insights, and historical trends, adding graphical visualizations for better decision-making.

name: Fitness Freak
about: Built a fitness platform with React.js offering activity exploration (yoga, workouts, etc.), fitness blogs, and a global chat system for community engagement, delivering a smooth and user-friendly experience.

name: WebChat
about: Created a real-time chat app with microservice architecture, Kafka, Socket.IO, and FCM, enabling instant messaging, group chats, and notifications across devices.

name: Foodie Go
about: Built a food delivery system with order creation, tracking, partner assignment, and smart recommendations. Implemented Kafka-based async communication, gRPC/REST APIs, FCM updates, and integrated Razorpay SDK with mobile apps for users and delivery partners.

name: System Library
about: Developed a Windows Explorerâ€“like desktop application using Electron and JavaScript, featuring smooth file navigation, classic interface design, and optimized for a seamless user experience.
